sentences.sentence: Fit chain drive sprocket on the crankshaft.
sentences.translation: 将链条驱动链轮安装到曲轴上。

sentences.sentence: It consists of the chain, the drive sprocket and the driven sprocket.
sentences.translation: 它是由链条和主、从动链轮所组成。

sentences.sentence: After seeing your chain and sprocket issues, it doesn't seem like any trouble at all!
sentences.translation: 在看到自己的链和链轮的问题，似乎并不像任何麻烦！
